QuestData.Title: The Shardmaidens
QuestData.Description:
Long have I walked this land and I have seen many forms of corruption.
The creatures that wander this hall are twisted by the magics unleashed by the failed arcan'dor. These dryads have lost their way, and cannot be saved.
You must destroy them. End their suffering.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 6 Shardmaidens in the Shattered Locus.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you. This place will never recover, but their madness need not harm others.
